snippet.title: "Felix The Cat: Against Enemies" JAVA GAME (MDEV 2007 year) RAREST GAME!
snippet.description:
The game was released in Brazil in 2007 under the name "Felix The Cat: Contra os Inimigos", which translates as "Cat Felix: Against Enemies".

Felix is ​​a black, cheerful and playful cat, a character created in the late 19th century. He has a yellow magic bag that can create various objects and weapons that will help the cat defeat the villains who want to destroy him. Felix will also need to protect his precious magic bag, which the enemies want to get.

In the game Felix the Cat: Against Enemies, the black cat will have to escape from the evil hands that want to steal your Magic Bag. Professor, Mestre Cylindro and Vavum challenge the cat Felix.

Felix will face three enemies, one at a time, two rounds each. During the battle, Felix must evade enemy attacks. He has a normal hit (with a boxing glove), this is a normal attack. Over time, your mana increases. When mom is full, Felix can use a special hit depending on the fullness of mana. If it is more than half full, he will use the “Water Spray” kick. However, if the bar is completely full, Felix can use another, more powerful blow: "Locking gun."
============================================================================
"Felix Contra os Inimigos" #FelixContraOsInimigos #FelixTheCat #javagames #джаваигры #игра #игранателефон #мобильнаяигра #phonegame #mobilegame #oldgames
